document.full_text: the deployment of thousands of heavily armed troops in iraq's kurdish city of sulaimaniya appears to have quelled, for the moment, two months of protests against corruption and authoritarian rule.
document.title: military presence halts protests in iraq's kurdistan
lines_and_colors: the deployment of thousands of heavily armed troops in iraq's kurdish city of sulaimaniya appears to have quelled, for the moment, two months of protests against corruption and authoritarian rule.
